adjective.description: Designating, relating to, or belonging to the hymenopteran insect family Megachilidae, which includes leaf-cutting bees and mason bees, typically having long tongues and long hairs on the underside of the abdomen for the collection of pollen.

origin: Early 20th century; earliest use found in Science. From scientific Latin Megachilides, subfamily name from Megachile + -ides.
